item.title: About
item.author: gr1dgh0st@gridsec.net (Gr1dGh0st)
item.description:
I am a cybersecurity professional specializing in offensive security and security research. Over the course of my educational and professional career I have earned numerous certifications, given talks, and have done extensive research into computer systems. Some notable contributions include:

  • During my time at my university while working for a research lab, I built out a new datacenter cluster for security research and protein folding
  • Managed a university datacenter with over 100 servers
  • Conducted and facilitated international joint military cybersecurity exercises
  • Led several teams including white, red, blue, and green, including serving as lead engineer on multiple projects
  • Presented talks to students and professionals about my research and how to improve the security of computer systems
  • Developed and researched malware that bypasses endpoint detection
  • Written articles on extensive research into Windows architecture and internal systems

Education, Qualifications, and Certifications
#

  • CRTO
  • PNPT
  • PMRP
  • PCRP
  • Net+
  • Sec+
  • B.S., in Management Information Systems specializing in cybersecurity and a minor in Cybersecurity
  • Member of Synack Red Team (SRT)

Contact Me
#

  • Email: gr1dgh0st@gridsec.net
